Operations Practice

COOs can maximize operational impact from gen AI and agentic AI by defining the right operating structure, data governance model, and change management approach. Gen AI is being used to automate, augment, and accelerate work across virtually every function, with potential productivity growth of $4.4 trillion over the long term.

Key Concepts:

  • Artificial Intelligence in Operations
  • Automation and Augmentation of Work
  • Productivity Growth Potential
  • Change Management
  • Operational Impact
  • Digital Innovation
  • Risk Mitigation
gen AI agentic AI operational impact data governance change management data management centralized system human oversight governance structure
